attributes.action: remove National Express of all its East Coast Rail Franchise.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
National Express took over the East Coast franchise in December 2007 and since then the franchise has become a disgrace. 
National Express removed all restaurent services onboard trains. They claim they are losing lots of money from these services but many passengers are complaining as they will now have to put up with a trolley services selling light refreshments.
National Express have also raised their peak hour prices. This means more of us have to suffer from paying more money in this economic downturn for a seat on a train.
